name: Fuzzy Rainbow
description:
How many can you connect?

In Fuzzy Rainbow you control a Rainbow Fuzzi, a cute little fluff ball that attacts other Fuzzies towards it. The Fuzzies like to be special and so don't like it when they connect with others that share their colour.

Connect as many Fuzzies in the amount of time you are given as you can by linking different colors together. You gain more points if they connect to an existing chain. Connect enough to reach milestones and bank your points.

Choose how you want to play by customising the round rules. Change the time and if getting penalties will cause a game over.
Try to get the best FPS (Fuzzies per Second) for a new Highscore.

Fuzzy Rainbow could be described as a "Reverse Bubble Shooter", where you are trying to catch the objects launched at you.

Controls (also shown in game):

Keyboard: W / S for moving your Fuzzi.
Mouse: For navigating menus and controls your Fuzzies direction.

Dev Note:
This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam. Following the theme of "Joined Together" and made over the time-span of 48 Hours.
Hope you enjoy, and feel free to share what your best FPS is.

Got any feedback for the Dev? Feel free to tweet @Katacaz and let me know!
